text: qal fireawn llshrt mstnkrana: amantum lmwsa bighayr 'iidhan mny, waqal mwhmana ann fiel musaa shr: 'iinah lakabirukum aladhi ellamkm alshr, falasawf taelamun ma yunazil bikum mn eqab: laqtenn 'aydiakum wa'arjulakum min khlaf: biqate alyad alyumnaa walrjl alyusraa 'aw eaks dhlk, wlaslbnnakm ajmeyn
